REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1555 reute h f BC-WHIRLPOOL-<WHR>-DISCU 10-20 0061

TEXT.TITLE: WHIRLPOOL <WHR> DISCUSSING JOINT VENTURE
TEXT.BODY: Whirlpool Corp said it is having joint venture discussions with <Vitro S.A.> of Monterrey, Nuevo Leon, Mexico, on the formation of a Mexican venture for the manufacture and sale of major home appliances. It said Vitro has consolidated sales projected at 1.0 billion dlrs (U.S.) for 1987. Reuter
